title: RC circuits - tau for 3 resistors and 2 capacitors

content.question: The figure shows a diagram of a circuit that has a battery, a switch <math alttext="S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>S</mtext></math>, three identical resistors of resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, and two identical capacitors of capacitance <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi></math>. Initially, the switch is open and the capacitors are uncharged. What is the time constant of the circuit?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
